p: The mixtures with clove oils exhibited additive effects of antibacterial activity against E. coli and P. aeruginosa, with the sole exception of the AgNPâ€“EO mixture at the 40:1 ratio for the E. coli bacterial culture. Exceptional synergistic effects were obtained for the inhibition of S. aureus growth with silver dispersions stabilized with chitosan in the presence of clove oil for all ratios tested.
